tables.title: Frontier Patrols
tables.description: Travel complications and allies along woodland trade roads.

entries.result: A disoriented rider mistakes the party for bandits and draws steel.
A druid circle requests help relocating a trapped owlbear cub.
A caravan of refugees seeks safe escort away from recent raids.
A wounded scout delivers a warning: hobgoblin forces march at dusk.
A fey court messenger offers a bargain to bypass their glade.
A toll bridge is held by mercenaries with dubious paperwork.
A rival adventuring party shares rumors of a haunted milestone.
A bandit ambush triggers as an uprooted tree crashes down.
A ranger patrol salutes the party and provides fresh trail rations.

tables.title: Forest Whispers
tables.description: Quiet prompts to spark roleplay while camping in ancient woods.

entries.result: Distant drums thrum beneath the earth, syncing with a hero's heartbeat.
A tree scar forms the party crest, fresh sap glistening like ink.
Owls repeat the last thing each hero said, but out of order.
An emerald fox leaves a trail of glowing pawprints circling the camp.
A dream of roots and rivers leaves someone waking with wet boots.
A broken arrow tied with silver thread points toward unseen ruins.
Motes of light hover over anyone who lies, revealing secrets at dawn.
A lullaby drifts through the leaves in a language none remember learning.

tables.title: Deepwood Weather Turns
tables.description: Quick swings in forest weather and terrain hazards.

entries.result: A choking pollen cloud imposes disadvantage on speech-based checks.
Sudden downpour floods low paths, adding hours to travel time.
Biting insects swarm; exposed creatures must rest in smoke or nets.
Moonlit auroras grant advantage to Wisdom (Perception) checks until dawn.
A landslide blocks the trail, revealing a buried stone archway.
Unseasonal frost coats the canopy; tracks are easy to follow for a mile.
